name: CosVent
description:
CosVent

A Homestuck FanGame tribute by NotQuiteApex

This game was inspired directly by Homestuck's unique walkaround panels, in which you could explore the world around you and interact with things in it. I wanted to remake this in a more modern programming language, one that could work faster than Flash's ActionScript.

Author's Note:

This is something I've been working on for almost 2 years, constantly restarting the entire project because I was never happy with the results. Fast-forward to now, and here it is. Part of it at least, I'm still considering adding some more RPG elements into the demo for fun, who knows.

For now, this is what came of my first introduction to Homestuck and programming, please enjoy.
